alert.note: Alert for Brown; Greene; Monroe; Sullivan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 27 at 3:36AM EDT until July 27 at 11:30AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of central Indiana, south central Indiana, southeast Indiana and southwest Indiana, including the following counties, in central Indiana, Bartholomew and Decatur. In south central Indiana, Brown, Jackson, Lawrence and Monroe. In southeast Indiana, Jennings. In southwest Indiana, Daviess, Greene, Knox, Martin and Sullivan. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Additional showers and thunderstorms today could lead to flooding, especially across areas that received heavy rain since Sunday. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
